name: Paper Forward - letterpress wrapping paper that gives back
blurb: Socially-conscious, eco-friendly letterpress kraft wrapping paper. My nautical holiday line will ship in time for 2014 gifts!

name: Cthulhu Letterpress Holiday Card With Foil Stamp
blurb: Letterpress holiday cards w/ a quote from The Festival by H.P. Lovecraft, hand-illustrated & hand-printed on 50-year-old press in NYC.

name: Cephalovepod Letterpress Valentine's Card SBPxPhineas
blurb: Letterpress card featuring "Cephalovepod" heart-shaped octopus image by Phineas X. Jones in time for Valentine's Day!

name: Loving New York - Der innovativste Reiseführer der Welt
blurb: Hier kommt die Revolution des Reiseführer-Marktes! Ein Reiseführer, der mit Hilfe einer eigens entwickelten App neue Maßstäbe setzt.

name: Literary Art on Letterpress
blurb: Beautiful letterpress prints for bibliophiles, word lovers and art lovers alike.

name: The Berlin Sixty-Six Deck
blurb: A handcrafted, letterpress card game by Volta Press, featuring original artwork based on beloved Berlin icons.

name: The Tiny Type Museum and Time Capsule
blurb: A tiny museum of authentic type and printing artifacts from letterpress to the present: a prized possession and a teaching tool.

name: The Book of GENESIS
blurb: Thornwillow  Press presents The Book of GENESIS in a multi-colored letterpress edition as it has never been seen before.

name: HOPE IS THE THING: Emily Dickinson Letterpress Print
blurb: 50 limited edition letterpress prints celebrating Emily Dickinson's beloved poetry using typography based on her own handwriting.

name: A Printer's Garden of Ornament
blurb: Typographic flowers, flourishes and fleurons: 100 books printed by letterpress from handset metal type ornaments

name: EDGAR ALLAN POE Tales, Mysteries, and Contrivances
blurb: A Landmark Edition — Beautifully designed, illustrated & hand crafted.

name: PARABLE OF THE SOWER by Octavia E. Butler
blurb: Thornwillow presents the first-ever fine press edition of the visionary author’s dystopian masterpiece.

name: Aldo Novarese: Alfa-Beta
blurb: The reissue of a typographic masterpiece

name: LGBTQ+ Greetings Cards - For Us, By Us!
blurb: LGBTQ+ themed greeting cards made by LGBTQ+ folks for LGBTQ+ folks! With clean and simple designs, you'll find a card for any occasion!

name: MAKE 100: BECOMING
blurb: 100 limited edition letterpress prints celebrating Kate Chopin's beloved work "The Awakening"

name: "A Scandal in Bohemia" by Arthur Conan Doyle
blurb: The first Sherlock Holmes short story, printed letterpress and handbound with original artwork.

name: Toni Morrison's SONG OF SOLOMON
blurb: Thornwillow is celebrating Morrison's legacy by creating the first fine-press edition of her iconic novel.

name: "I Am No Bird" Limited Edition Letterpress Print
blurb: 100 large letterpress prints, signed and numbered by the artist. Artwork inspired by Jane Eyre by Charlotte Brontë.

name: 'Master and Commander' – Fine Press Edition
blurb: A new edition worthy of Patrick O'Brian's brilliance… Letterpress printed… Hand-bound… Artisan materials… New Illustrations.
